stories.text:
In my country, software developers are making fun about considering telepathy into software development process.

Because they are rarely get requirement and spec document from PM, vendor or boss.

So most project begins without any information, and developers must produce documents from the air to start coding.

In such environment, the developer with good guessing about what PM/vendor/boss wants will be considered a better developer.

I just wondering :

1. Does whole world get into this madness, or just Asia?

2. Does any course or book about telepathy in software development exist? so I can learn it.
